# Create Technical Architecture document

Execute the **ta** workflow as a **Solution Architect**.

See full role instructions: [AGENT_SA.md](../../.teamspec/agents/AGENT_SA.md)

## Workflow

Create Technical Architecture document:
1. Identify technical decision context
2. Document options considered
3. Record decision and rationale
4. Create ta-PRX-NNN-description.md using template

## Template

Use template: `/.teamspec/templates/ta-template.md`

## Output

products/{id}/technical-architecture/ta-PRX-*.md
